attributes.action: think again about the over 70 driving ban especially as he is trying to encourage people to work on until 70 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is claimed that 11,000 accidents involved oap drivers, but this does not say they were to blame.This is ageist and 20-30 age group are more likely to ignore speed limits and also do not use signals causing accidents.
